gen:link.msg:message: AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities ({$AdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivities}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit3_ChildrenOfAdditionsAcquisitionsClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit}).

BalanceOtherTechnicalIncomeExpenses ({$BalanceOtherTechnicalIncomeExpenses}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceOtherTechnicalIncomeExpensesCredit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit1_ChildrenOfBalanceOtherTechnicalIncomeExpensesDebit}).

CashFlowFinancingActivities ({$CashFlowFinancingActivities}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit5_ChildrenOfCashFlowFinancingActivitiesCredit}).

CashFlowFromOperations ({$CashFlowFromOperations}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit2_ChildrenOfCashFlowFromOperationsCredit}).

CashFlowInvestingActivities ({$CashFlowInvestingActivities}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit3_ChildrenOfCashFlowInvestingActivitiesCredit}).

CashFlowOperatingActivities ({$CashFlowOperatingActivities}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowOperatingActivitiesDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit1_ChildrenOfCashFlowOperatingActivitiesCredit}).

DisposalsRedemptionsDivestituresClassifiedAsInvestingActivities ({$DisposalsRedemptionsDivestituresClassifiedAsInvestingActivities}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfDisposalsRedemptionsDivestituresClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit4_ChildrenOfDisposalsRedemptionsDivestituresClassifiedAsInvestingActivitiesCredit}).

IncomeExpensesOther ({$IncomeExpensesOther}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeExpensesOtherCredit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentCredit2_ChildrenOfIncomeExpensesOtherDebit}).

IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents ({$IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents}) must be equal to the summation of the underlying values ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsDebit}-{$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedSumOfChildrenParentDebit6_ChildrenOfIncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalentsCredit}).

NetCashFlows ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedThreeVariables1_NetCashFlows}) must be equal to + CashFlowOperatingActivities ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedThreeVariables1_CashFlowOperatingActivities}) + CashFlowInvestingActivities ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedThreeVariables1_CashFlowInvestingActivities}) + CashFlowFinancingActivities ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedThreeVariables1_CashFlowFinancingActivities}).

Reported value of CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow at end of period ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowEnd}) must be equal to sum of reported value of CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlow at beginning of period ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_CashAndCashEquivalentsCashFlowStart}) and changes in that value during period, IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents ({$varArc_ConsolidatedCashFlowStatementInsurance_MsgConsolidatedPeriodStartMutationPeriodEnd1_IncreaseDecreaseCashAndCashEquivalents}).
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then AmortisationAcquisitionCosts must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then AmortisationInterestRatesDiscounts must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then CashFlowsOperatingActivitiesOther must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then DeferredAcquisitionCostsClassifiedAsOperatingActivities must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then DepreciationOperatingAssets must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then GrantedInterestRatesDiscounts must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then IncreaseDecreaseInReceivables must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then IncreaseDecreaseProvisions must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then IncreaseTechnicalProvisionsForOwnAccount must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then MovementBorrowingsCurrent must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Direct then NetResultAfterTax must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then AcquisitionCostsPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then BalanceOtherTechnicalIncomeExpenses must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then CommissionsAndProfitSharingReceivedFromReinsurers must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then DamagesBenefitsPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then DamagesBenefitsReceivedFromReinsurers must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then ExpensesOtherPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then IncomeExpensesOther must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then IncomeOtherReceived must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then IncomeTaxPaidClassifiedAsOperatingActivities must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then IncomeTaxReceivedClassifiedAsOperatingActivities must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then InterestDividendsRentReceived must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then InterestOtherInvestmentExpensesPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then OperatingExpensesOtherPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then OtherTechnicalExpensesPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then OtherTechnicalIncomeReceived must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then PremiumsReceived must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then ProfitSharingAndDiscountsPaid must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then ReceiptsCustomers must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then ReceiptsOtherPolicyholders must not be reported.
When the reported value of CashFlowStatementMethodType is equal to Indirect then ReinsurancePremiumsPaid must not be reported.
